title: Not sure if zacs broken, or my norms mmr is just that much worse than my ranked mmr.
body:
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/146596448/201665539?tab=stats

No items, bought a trinket at 0:25 and thats about it.

replies.body:
Seriously? 
You sold them at the end of the game


............

Click on playerbuilds smart ass.

It shows you what i bought and when i bought them.

Seriously its like you arent even trying anymore.

Infact here ill do it for you.

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/146596448/201665539?tab=builds

Trinket at 25 seconds and not a single purchase after that.

Ok I was lazy. 
Congrats you had an easy game. 

Now go do it again.  You'll climb in no time

Edit - so I watched some of the game. Probably some of the most selfish supporting I've seen in some time. Not hard to take a kill when  you just sit in the brushes while trist 1v2's to just steal a kill with EWQ

Which site exactly did you use to watch it since no replay of it exists and it isnt possible to retroactively spectate it.

Yellow: 2, Fatty: 0

also if i just ks'd trists kills how the fuck did she get 10 kills, unless we killed the botlane 19 times.

10/10 logic.

http://www.replay.gg/search/oce/Yellowbrickroad#

Edit. I've watched lots of your games actually. There is always a pattern of selfish play and over committing

1v9 playstyle*

The only consistent playstyle that will maintain a somewhat ok chance at winning.

Because riot REALLY wants league to be a team game, and unfortunately as mmr takes 3000+ games to move 1 point apparently you basically have to play around the fact that you cannot trust your teams.

In my mind in this elo where its 100% possible that i could be playing with a blind retarded dog with potatos for arms and a broken keyboard, id much rather NOT put my life on the line to save them only to die in the process because they are boosted animals.

And instead consolidate my own power so that we have atleast one relevant person on the team for late game.

In most cases it works, and the only times it doesnt work is when the team is so incredibly boosted that even with the lead i manufacture for myself i still cant carry them.

Granted you are starting to sound like a broken record fatty 

"you die too much" yellow rebuttles with the fact that he wouldnt die as often if 90% of his games didnt involve a 12/5 enemy adc or some kind of bullshit like that, that decided that yellows fed ass was a big enough threat to roam and style on him.

"you dont help your team though" which yellow replies to yet again with a "you cant help stupid, best not to involve yourself so as to not get sucked into said stupid"

Rinse repeat those 2 points until you come up with something new.

What will it be next i dont cs enough?

It's so frustrating how someone can be SO SET on their attitude despite evidence that it's not working for them.


Whatever you are doing, obviously is not working. So you need to change something! 

I used to think like you. I blamed teammates. I changed the way I play and why I play and how I look at the game. And I reached Silver 3.
Thats EXACTLY what soo many people say to describe how they got out of bronze. 
Yet you insist on this ideal that is just.... Infuriatingly silly

Except i know its teammates.

There isnt ONE consistent factor in my games.

Theres me.

The matchmaking system.

And the fact no one will work together because everyone is random.

What happens if i remove the rng aspects and queue up with a full 5 man premade team?

We win.

Period like 9/10 we just win by default.

Is anyone carrying? for the most part no, because i only queue with people that i deem to be on my own skill level.

So im not carrying.

My mates arent carrying etc etc.

Hell if we do carry its usually because one of us lost our lane so the rest of the team went full teamwork mode and got them back into the game.

That is not possible in bronze elo solo queue, and the only reason it works in my premades is because i usually have everyone in a discord.

If i win my premade games 9/10 why am i still not climbing? because i have a solo preference, i play solo atleast 5 times more than i do premade.

Hell i can even tell you why i win with those premade teams.

Its because they are consistent, i know the players, i know HOW they play, i know what to expect and what not to expect.

In a premade i wont engage that 2v1 just because the jungler is heading to my lane because i know the junglers playstyle and am aware he isnt going to help.

In solo queue i dont have that luxory so have to make my plays based off the information my team gives me, so if my jungler pings on his way when im about to back im going to cancel my back and hold the lane for him, because he has given me the information he is coming.

At that point two things happen, its my fault for forgetting im in bronze and trusting my team for a split second, and its his fault for giving me misinformation.

Or to dumb it down further.

Teamwork is a 2 way street.

Im willing to cooperate, but that doesnt mean my teams are, that is why i just forgo the whole teamwork shtick all together, atleast until i reach an elo where everyone pulls their heads out their asses.

because quite frankly "teamwork" where only one person is being a team player only results in a negative effect.

cant count the number of times in the past that i have jumped into a fight to throw some cc down and save a teammate only to run away with him and die because he isnt willing to do the same shit for me.

Ok. I'd like to see where you are getting that 9/10 win rate with 5 man premade info lol
100% incorrect..

Also. You aren't helping your team mates because they aren't helping you. Ok.
Lets turn it around. To them, you are just another team mate. Not just a team mate, but a team mate who isn't helping them. So because you are not helping them, they are not going to help you.
**Do you see the cycle?**
Do you see how your playstyle **CAN HAVE ZERO POSITIVE EFFECT, ONLY NEGATIVE**

If you were the one to break the cycle and help for the sake of it, then maybe they would turn around and say "hey, this guys is alright, ill help him out"
Maybe they will, maybe they wont,** BUT THERE IS THAT CHANCE OF A POSITIVE EFFECT.**

I mean fucking hell, if you want to maximize your chance at winning, do something fucking different to what you have been for the last 800 games because **ITS NOT WORKING**
